transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, good evening, speaking from IndiaMART, this is Deepanshi.
Customer: Bolo.
Executive: Are you getting my voice?
Customer: Haan aa rahi hai bolo.
Executive: Haan, Vithal ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Bolta, bolo aap.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan bolo bolo aage bolo.
Executive: Sir, Vithal ji baat kar rahe hain na aap?
Customer: Haan bol raha hai bol raha bolo aage bolo toh.
Executive: Sir, services ke regarding aapko connect kiya, koi issue vagaira ho, services ke regarding aap bata rahe the.
Customer: Haan, kitna, kitna baar, kitna baar bataya wahi problem hai services ka. IndiaMART mein shop query nahi chal raha hai hamara.
Executive: Kya nahi ho raha hai?
Customer: Woh chalta hi nahi toh kuch kya hai.
Executive: Buyleads ke regarding aap last time bol rahe the buyleads ke details mein aa rahe the.
Customer: Kuch nahi madam woh kuch sudhara nahi sirf aap apna formality karte hain phone karte hain humko pagal banane ka kaam chal raha hai.
Executive: Sir formality nahi hoti hai cheezein, main wahi dekh rahi thi ki aapke yaha pe kitni kam hai.
Customer: Abhi lead toh hai kya lead toh kuch bhi lead nahi madam.
Executive: Buyleads nahi hai.
Customer: Sirf khali aapka faltu mein aap se main ek baar call karne ka paisa chal raha hai thoda.
Executive: Sir aapko maine apna number bhi diya gaya diya hua tha, sir ne bhi aapko call kiya.
Customer: Kya number deke kya phone karke kya karu madam?
Executive: Haan? Sir aapko hum har din samay sakte hain sir, but main ye puch rahi thi sir ne bhi aapko call kiya hua hoga shayad.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Aur nahi kiya kya?
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Sir ye jo primary number hai kin ka number hai? 75 wala jo number hai?
Customer: 75 ka hai?
Executive: 695 wala jo number hai?
Customer: Woh office mein rehta hai.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Woh office mein rehta hai.
Executive: Achha office wala number hai.
Executive: Haan isi se connect kiya gaya hai. Haan ji sir main ye puch rahi thi ki aapko regular buyleads aa rahi hai right? Last time apna discussion hua tha ki kuch buyleads se aap kaam karenge. Aapko kuch lagi buyleads?
Customer: Abhi lead hi nahi aa rahe madam aapko kitna din se bata raha hu main wahi isliye main ek hi sab.
Executive: Aa hi rahi hai sir main wahi puch rahi hu main aapse aapko thoda time aapke sir product mein competition hai main maan ke un cheeze but leads aapko thodi regular si aa rahi hongi. Aap kitni order value tak ki chal rahe hai aapko? 3000, 10000.
Customer: Nahi nahi lead hi nahi madam kuch nahi lead hi nahi hai ek bhi lead nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Achha lead nahi hai.
Executive: Ek minute sir hold kare ek minute bas.
Executive: Pan India deal karte hain na sir aap?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Pan India deal karte hain na Pan India?
Customer: All India.
Customer: Aap karte hain.
Customer: Dobara repeat kar rahe hain kya hum toh kya nahi bataunga kya, kya kar rahe hain?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Bolo.
Executive: Haan ji sir main ye puch rahi hu aap Pan India deal karte hain ya sirf Maharashtra mein karte hain?
Customer: Idhar bhi karta hu madam.
Executive: Sabhi jagah karte hain, theek hai. Ek minute.
Executive: Self drilling screw mein karte hain aap?
Customer: Madam mera hardware ka kaam hai baki kya usme catalog diya hai maine jab aapko catalog aapne close karke rakha hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi haan main yahi puch rahi thi ek minute lead dekh rahi thi mujhe wahi puch rahi aap isme deal karte hain self drilling screw mein?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Ek buylead aa rahi thi aapko 1 lakh se 2 lakh something ki order value ki. Screw self drilling screw ki.
Customer: Nahi nahi woh nahi karte madam.
Executive: Achha isme nahi karte aap?
[inaudible]
Executive: Sir dekho leads hai aapko but woh thodi detailed uske leads hai. Vithal ji ek kaam kar sakte hain aap sir 5-10 minute ke liye kal kis time free honge?
Executive: Aaj ki mujhe aapke products jo hai mapping karni hai, correction karni hai thodi products mapping mein us pe discussion karna hai.
Customer: Madam har wohi mein ek hi kaam madam kitna matlab.
Executive: Kal 5-10 minute ke liye aap free ho sakte hain kya? Kyuki actually mujhe laptop pe apni screen vagaira share karke proper tarike se discussion kar payenge. Isme mujhe mapping karni hai aapki.
Customer: Abhi abhi karo na. Abhi karo abhi karo kuch karne do.
Executive: Abhi sir main ja rahi thi waise kal connect nahi kar sakte kya sir?
Customer: Nahi kal nahi madam abhi kar sakta hu main abhi ichha idhar.
Executive: Abhi karenge?
Customer: Abhi kar rahe hain.
Executive: Kal subah connect kar lu kya sir 10 baje?
Customer: Nahi kal nahi hoga.
Executive: Kal nahi hai aap? Toh theek hai abhi share kar rahi hu main aapko link.
Executive: Whatsapp kar du sir main link aapko share?
Customer: Mail mail karo madam main connect karta hu.
Executive: Main aapko share kar rahi hu please aap join kar lijiye.
Customer: Theek hai? Mail pe na?
Executive: Haan mail pe bhi aayega agar mail pe agar aapko nahi dikh raha toh main aapko whatsapp kar deti hu.
Executive: Abhi ek minute main share kar rahi hu na please dekhna aapko aaya link?
Executive: Main aapko share kar rahi hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Shop query not working on IndiaMART.

- Feels like executive is wasting time.

- Not receiving any buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to map products.

- Agreed to share screen and discuss product mapping.

- Executive shared the link on mail.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to share link on WhatsApp if needed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product mapping, shop query
